explains: adj. 整体的，全面的；功能整体性的
wordGroup: holistic approach 整体分析，整体研究
holistic health 整体健康；全人健康
holistic education 全人教育；整体教育

sentences.en: Many teachers have an intuitive sense that different students have different learning styles. Some are verbal and some are visual; some are linear, and some are holistic.
sentences.cn: 许多老师都有一种直觉，不同的学生有不同的学习风格。有些是语言的，有些是视觉的；有些是线性的，有些是整体的。

sentences.en: Smith says he'll provide services ranging from formal seminars to on-farm work-shops on holistic management, to one-on-one hand-holding and an almost 24/7 phone hotline for farmers who are converting.
sentences.cn: 史密斯说他会提供一系列的服务，从关于整体管理的正式研讨会到农场工作坊，再到体贴周到的一对一服务以及几乎全日无休的热线电话，为正在转型的农民提供帮助。

sentences.en: Academic inquiry, at least in some fields, may need to become less exclusionary and more holistic.
sentences.cn: 至少在部分领域，学术调查可能需要减少排他性，变得更全面一些。
